app.name: WiiMC-SS
app.long_description:
An updated version of WiiMC.
It can display cover art for popular audio formats as well as dynamic art for radio streams.
Videos can be set to have a description alongside poster art, and can be shuffled or looped.
Further tweaks and fixes, radio streams can reconnect after a minute of inactivity. H.264 videos can have deblocking removed to greatly improve speed. ADX/BRSTM game sound files can loop correctly.
The GameCube controller or a Nintendo 3DS can be used to control nearly everything.
